member.name: GdiplusAbort.Abort
member.summary: Abort is an application-defined method that is called periodically by Windows GDI+ during time-consuming rendering operations. See the structure.
member.returns: Return S_OK for GDI+ to continue the rendering operation. Return E_ABORT for GDI+ to abort the rendering operation.

summary.para: The GdiplusAbort structure provides a mechanism that allows Windows GDI+ to call an application-defined Abort method periodically during time-consuming rendering operations.
